law.catch_line: State agencies to notify secretary for energy and environment of activities affecting stream areas.
law.text: All state agencies shall, promptly upon June 16, 1972, inform the secretary for energy and environment of any proceedings, studies, or other activities within their jurisdictions, and regardless of by whom requested, which are now in progress and which affect or may affect any of the streams specified in KRS 146.241. They shall likewise inform him of any such proceedings, studies or other activities which are hereafter commenced or resumed before they are commenced or resumed.
law.history: Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 24, sec. 129, effective July 15, 2010. -- Amended 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 188, sec. 107, effective July 15, 1980. -- Amended 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 74, Art. III, sec. 13(9). -- Created 1972 Ky. Acts ch. 117, sec. 12.
